name: DodgePong
description:
This is the first prototype for DodgePong. The download available in this page consists of an early, incomplete version of the game.

Remake of the classic Pong game, with a DodgeBall twist! You can shoot the ball on enemies to make them explode, and scoring afterwards.

One of the greatest features in mind is Multiplayer with smartphones. Currently there is a server of the game that is playable with at most two person in the keyboard and more players when connected with Android devices. Player may run the Android version to join the server game and control their player using the smartphone as a controller.

*** This game is being produced with the support of GameDev Society UFRGS. Check it out on fb.com/gdsufrgs
